title: Champion Groups!
body: So for those of you who didn't know, you can type in "marksman" in the search bar to pull up every marksman in champ select. Now, why shouldn't we be able to create our own groups so that when we search it or maybe click a tab at the top of the box that certain champions come up. It would really help me find a champ to play in the quick 30 seconds we have.
